name: emoceans
description:
emoceans is an adorable little game made for ludum dare 49 about balancing emotions carefully, carefully in a barrage of ocean waves.

you are an emotionally unstable ship. use arrow keys to navigate the waters and stay afloat for as long as you can.

made for ludum dare 49 : "unstable".  a compo entry made in about 7 hours by bucketfish.

emotions are complicated. happiness is easy and gentle on your experiences. excitement is less so - more thrilling, yes, but more risky, but it's fun. anger takes the grasp from your hands and threatens to topple you over. sadness lingers like a slow drudge and resists your pull.

manage it.

a minor patch has been made to fix the timer not working properly.
